infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Yatra uses your location to automatically detect your current city and provide better travel suggestions.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Yatra needs background location access to track your journey even when the app is closed. This enables automatic trip recording and emergency features.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Yatra tracks your location in the background to provide continuous trip monitoring and safety features.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Yatra uses your camera to scan QR codes and capture travel moments.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Yatra uses your microphone for voice search and audio recording features.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Yatra needs access to your photo library to save and share your travel memories.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Yatra uses your contacts to help you share trip details with friends and family.
